qas.question: Storyboards and what are thought to be comics by some?
Storyboards are used a lot by what?
Who does not often see storyboards used in film making?
A book with pictures with no captions that tell a story are called what?
Storyboards and what are thought to be comics by all?
Storyboards are not used a lot by what?
Scripts are used a lot by what?
A book without pictures with no captions that tell a story are called what?

context: Some consider storyboards and wordless novels to be comics. <a1_0><b6_0><b7_0>Film studios<b7_0/><b6_0/><a1_0/>, especially in animation, often use sequences of images as guides for film sequences. These storyboards are not intended as <a2_0><b8_0>an end product<b8_0/><a2_0/> and are rarely seen by <a3_0>the public<a3_0/>. <a0_0><a4_0><b5_0><b9_0>Wordless novels<b9_0/><b5_0/><a4_0/><a0_0/> are books which use sequences of captionless images to deliver a narrative.
